scripts.activate-venv: echo To ENABLE the virtual environment, use one of the commands bellow: && echo ------------------------------------------------------- && echo At Git Bash/Linux/Mac: source venv/Scripts/activate && echo At Windowss CMD: venv\Scripts\activate && echo -------------------------------------------------------
scripts.start: echo WARNING ‚ùó Ensure that the virtual environment (venv) is ENABLED before running this command. && python run.py
